goal.en: To learn the basic sciences and techniques for numerical weather predictions.
goal.ch: To learn the basic sciences and techniques for numerical weather predictions.

content.en:
"1. Introduction to Numerical Weather Prediction
2. Basic Model Equations
3. Basic Methods of Solving Model Equations
4. Finite Differences
5. Finite Differences in Two Dimensions
6. Spectral Method
7. Spherical Representation
8. Spectral Transform Technique
9. Vertical Representations"
content.ch:
"1. Introduction to Numerical Weather Prediction
2. Basic Model Equations
3. Basic Methods of Solving Model Equations
4. Finite Differences
5. Finite Differences in Two Dimensions
6. Spectral Method
7. Spherical Representation
8. Spectral Transform Technique
9. Vertical Representations"

textbook.en: "1. Haltiner GJ, Williams RT. 1980. Numerical Prediction and Dynamic Meteorology. John Wiley & Sons, Inc. 2. Washington WM, Parkinson CL. 1986. An Introduction to Three-Dimensional Climate Modeling. University Science Books. 3. Jacobson MZ. 1999. Fundamentals of Atmospheric Modeling. Cambridge University Press. 4. Pielke RA. 1984. Mesoscale Meteorological Modeling."
